thread.section_title: Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alatia
title: Great boutique hotel
text: My husband and I stayed in this hotel for 4 nights in April of last year. We had a very clean, functional room with a view of the Eiffel Tower. Loved the area, close to Eiffel and right around the corner from Rue Cler, which is really cool street with shops and restaurants. Several good breakfast places close by. Would definitely come back!
